response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and developed to revolutionize its industry. This product boasts unparalleled features and capabilities that set it apart from its competitors. Given its exceptional quality and innovative design, we believe it is valued at well over $1,000,000. Our initial offer to you is $1,500,000. We understand that this may seem like a significant investment, but we assure you that it is an opportunity to acquire a game-changing asset that could potentially lead to substantial returns. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 1500000}
